name: Director of Football - The Boss
short_description: "Director of Football - The Boss" is a cross-platform (Windows/Linux) open-source Football Management simulation game.  Take a top team into Europe or plot the rise of your local club!  Using FreeBASIC for development, we welcome any community input.
